name: BackgroundBaseball
0:
”Alexa, start playing background baseball”
”Alexa, play background baseball”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: background baseball
des:
Stream the background summer time sounds of old MLB radio broadcasts from 1933-1973. 

Using public domain broadcasts courtesy of archive.org you can hear decades of All Star games, World Series matchups, and other old matchups as called through Harry Caray, Vin Scully, Phil Rizzuto, and more.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
